# Parent Sign-Off for Field Work

Before participating in any service fieldwork activities, students must obtain guardian approval through our digital signature system. This ensures that parents/guardians are fully informed about the nature, location, and requirements of the fieldwork experience. 

To complete this requirement:
1. Log into your student portal
2. Navigate to the "Field Work Authorization" form
3. Have your parent/guardian review the details and provide their digital signature
4. Submit the completed form at least 48 hours before your scheduled fieldwork

Students without proper authorization will not be permitted to participate in off-campus service activities.
